story.title: How to Play CheckMate Advance
story.text: Start a run and challenge each of the Boss Pieces to a game of chess. But these are not ordinary games of chess.

story.title: The Game
story.text: Win a game by meeting the required score within 10 turns. Your Score is a product of the Piece you move and your Advantage

story.title: Offense is the best defense
story.text: Capture your opponents pieces to improve your Advantage, and use Cards to enhance your Pieces.

story.title: The Shop
story.text: Hit the shop to buy Cards. Your score can improve drastically with the right deck combo. Good Luck!
